title: Programme of work for minimizing the application of Agro-chemicals in Agriculture in Sri Lanka
decision_details:
-  approximately 8,000 MT of Agro-chemicals and 900,000 MT of chemical fertilizer are imported to Sri Lanka annually.  The Ministry of Agriculture has drawn up a Programme to minimize the use of Agro?chemicals and pesticides by 2020, adhering to the following practices: 

*	minimizing the use of pesticides and agro?chemicals gradually;
*	appointment of officers engaged in agriculture extension activities as Plant Physicians in Crop Clinics; and
*	the establishment of Organic Villages.

	The above information was submitted to the Cabinet by Hon. Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena, Minister of Agriculture.
